name: Health102 Fruit Salad
description: Indulge in a refreshing and guilt-free Health102 Fruit Salad, perfect for those following a healthy lifestyle. Packed with high-fiber fruits like apple, watermelon, banana, cantaloupe, and honeydew melon, this salad is a delightful mix of sweet and crunchy textures. Sprinkled with cinnamon for an aromatic kick and nestled on a bed of green leaf lettuce, this low-sodium, healthified recipe is an excellent choice for anyone looking to enjoy a nutritious and delicious treat.
recipeIngredient: 1  cup shredded, Lettuce, green leaf, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your fruits: Core and dice the apple, cube the watermelon, slice the banana, cube the cantaloupe, and cube the honeydew melon.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the diced apple, cubed watermelon, sliced banana, cubed cantaloupe, and cubed honeydew melon.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and shred the green leaf lettuce, then add it to the bowl with the fruits.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the cinnamon powder over the fruits and lettuce, and gently toss the salad to ensure an even coating of cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
